projectGridLines.title: Full Stack Engineer
projectGridLines.description:
Lead responsible for the development, testing and timely release of

core product

? Quickly build experimental scrappy usable products and iterate

? Desire to engage with cutting-edge technologies such as LLM, AI, ML,

etc. is highly valued. Having prior experience in developing products

with these technologies is a significant advantage.

? The individual should be willing to acquire new technologies and skills

as needed to successfully execute a project.

? Liaising with founders and designers to understand business domain,

STACK

? React

? Node.js

? Python based framework (Django, FastAPI)

? Web scraping

? AWS Cloud

? Interest in working with LLM/AI/ML

requirements and problems in order to accordingly plan product features

and releases.

? Troubleshoot, test and maintain the core product software and databases

to ensure strong optimization and functionality

? Help team in technical challenges

? Identifying risks and forming contingency plans as soon as possible

projectGridLines.title: AI powered web applications
projectGridLines.description:
Description: Develop and maintain AI-powered web applications.

Skill sets:

a. LLM models, Python, JavaScript, HTML, CSS

b. Django, Flask, React, Angular

c. TensorFlow, Keras, PyTorch

d. RESTful APIs, Microservices

e. SQL, NoSQL

f. AWS, Azure, Google Cloud

Traits expectation:

a. Problem-solving

b. Teamwork

c. Communication

d. Adaptability

e. Attention to detail

Expected learning:

a. Advanced web dev

b. AI integration

c. Cloud deployment

d. Full-stack skills

projectGridLines.title: Dynamic LLM-Powered website extraction engine
projectGridLines.description:
Description: Develop a tool using Large Language Models (LLMs) to efficiently extract specific

parameters from web data

Skill sets:

a. LLM models, Python

b. BeautifulSoup, Scrapy, Selenium

c. APIs

d. HTML, CSS, JavaScript

e. Data processing

Traits expectation:

a. Detail-oriented

b. Persistent

c. Self-motivated

d. Analytical

Expected learning:

a. Web scraping

b. Automation

c. Data handling

d. Regulatory requirements

e. Data analysis

projectGridLines.title: Develop and optimize algorithms to extract specific parameters from large unstructured data
projectGridLines.description:
Description: Create and improve algorithms to efficiently extract specific parameters from large

volumes of unstructured data.

Skill sets:

a. LLM models, Python

b. Machine Learning (ML)

c. Data Structures & Algorithms

d. NLP

Traits expectation:

a. Problem-solving

b. Teamwork

c. Communication

d. Adaptability

e. Attention to detail

Expected learning:

a. Efficient algorithm design

b. Big data processing

c. NLP applications

e. Data extraction optimization
